code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{uploadFile}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UploadFile(){const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleUpload=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!file)return;await uploadFile(file);setMessage("Upload successful!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Upload File"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleUpload,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:e=>setFile(e.target.files[0])}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Upload"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:message})]});}export default UploadFile;
